mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.zhiyuanzhe_name as zhiyuanzheName ,a.zhiyuanzhe_phone as zhiyuanzhePhone ,a.zhiyuanzhe_id_number as zhiyuanzheIdNumber ,a.zhiyuanzhe_photo as zhiyuanzhePhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.zhiyuanzhe_email as zhiyuanzheEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zhiyuanzhe a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.zhiyuanzhe_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiyuanzheName},'%')
and a.zhiyuanzhe_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiyuanzhePhone},'%')
and a.zhiyuanzhe_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiyuanzheIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.zhiyuanzhe_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiyuanzheEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
